name: Fiddle
description:
A game made for the GMC Jam #45, with the theme of Nursery Rhymes.

Controls: LEFT/RIGHT or A/D  - Move
SPACE  - Play a note
UP/W   - Interact, climb ladder
DOWN/S   - Change song type

The cat must use the fiddle to manipulate the world, collect items and amuse their dog friend with an amazing scene.
